page.title: 19 Family Life
page.content:
{ A Typical Day
My name is Helen Littley and I am a pupil of Seaton Primary School. I am 11 years old. A typical day is as follows. I wake up at about 7.45am. I have breakfast which consists of a banana, a slice of buttered toast and a glass of orange juice. Dad drives me to School on the way to the office. School starts off with a morning assembly. We have two breaks in the day in which we play games like Hop Scotch and Hey Presto. School ends at 3.30pm. When dad comes home we have dinner. After dinner I go to Guides and we have rounders and lots of trips and walks. Guides starts at 7.00pm and ends at 9.00pm. I have a drink and then I go to bed.
